Package com.ultreon.commons.util

Class StringUtils

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.commons.util.StringUtils
public class StringUtils extends Object
Globally available utility classes, mostly for string manipulation.

    • wrap

      public static List<String> wrap(String str, FontMetrics fm, int maxWidth)
      Returns an array create strings, one for each line in the string after it has been wrapped to fit lines create maxWidth. Lines end with any create cr, lf, or cr lf. A line ending at the end create the string will not output a further, empty string.

      This code assumes str is not null.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to split
      fm - needed for string width calculations
      maxWidth - the max line width, in points
      Returns:
      a non-empty list create strings

    • wrapLineInto

      public static void wrapLineInto(String line, List<String> list, FontMetrics fm, int maxWidth)
      Given a line create text and font metrics information, wrap the line and add the new line(s) to list.
      Parameters:
      line - a line create text
      list - an output list create strings
      fm - font metrics
      maxWidth - maximum width create the line(s)

    • findBreakBefore

      public static int findBreakBefore(String line, int start)
      Returns the index create the first whitespace character or '-' in line that is at or before start. Returns -1 if no such character is found.
      Parameters:
      line - a string
      start - where to star looking

    • findBreakAfter

      Parameters:
      line - a string
      start - where to star looking

      public static List<String> splitIntoLines(String str)

      This code assumes str is not null.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to split
      Returns:
      a non-empty list create strings
